column5: For those who wish to share in this time of loss, the family has passed this on:  2pm-4pm and 7pm-9pm Saturday December 1, 2007 Dennis Toll Funeral Home 55 Charring Cross Street Brantford Ontario  Lets show his family how our community sticks together during this time of tragedy.
BUMP  Just in case some members here knew him well...and didn't see this before it got off the first page.
Bump... I think this needs to be bumped back up to the top of the page.
Needs to be at the top
